body.name: HONEYFUR pH Balanced Natural Feminine Wash For Sensitive Skin – Sulfates & Paraben Free – Soothing, Refreshing, Calms Irritation – 200 ML / 6.7 FL OZ
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 17 hrs 36 mins
features: pH BALANCED – Formulated with powerful natural ingredients to provide the optimal pH balance to the intimate area. High-quality ingredients with natural extracts leave the skin soft and velvety.
NATURAL – This intimate wash is formulated with propolis, eucalyptus, bergamot, and tea tree oils. Blended with native European essential oils to cleanse in a delicate way.
EFFECTIVE – Soothing & Refreshing – Combats itching – Calms irritation.
MADE WITHOUT – Sulfates, Parabens, Silicones, Alcohol, Glycerin, Dioxides, Carcinogens, Mineral Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Artificial Fragrance, Polyethylene Glycol, Synthetic Preservatives.
CRUELTY-FREE – Made in Italy – Eco-Certified: Formulated with ingredients from ECOCERT and COSMOS certified organic farms.
body.description: Essential care for your intimate area.Effective. Delicate. Clean.🌿 The Essence of HONEYFUR Come back to basics and find your balance with HONEYFUR. Flourish yourself with simplicity and the highest quality of our products.🌿 NATURAL. Created with cleanest, purest, highest quality ingredients, enriched with natural extracts. Designed without harmful chemicals.🌿 MADE IN ITALY Uniquely blended with European origin essential oils, mostly sourced in organic farms or harvested in the wild in Italy.🌿 ECOCERT Produced in the Eco-Certified laboratory. ECOCERT is a globally recognized natural and organic cosmetic certification.HONEYFUR Intimate Wash is formulated with natural ingredients to provide the optimal pH balance to the intimate area. Blended with native European essential oils to cleanse in a delicate way. High-quality ingredients with natural extracts leave the skin soft and velvety.pH BalancedSoothing and RefreshingCalms IrritationKey Ingredients: Propolis, Eucalyptus Oil, Bergamot Oil, Tea Tree OilMade Without:Sulfates, Parabens, Silicones, Alcohol, Glycerin, Dioxides, Carcinogens, Mineral Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Artificial Fragrance, Polyethylene Glycol, Synthetic Preservatives.How to Use:Gently lather and apply externally to wet skin. Cleanse and rinse thoroughly. Safe for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I recently started using this feminine wash product and I am extremely happy with the results! Not only does it leave me feeling fresh and clean, but it also has a pleasant scent. I love that it is gentle on my sensitive skin and doesn't cause any irritation. I have noticed a significant improvement in my overall vaginal health and I highly recommend this product to all women. It is a must-have in my daily routine and I will definitely continue using it. Thank you for creating such an amazing product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I tried this wash, because of a recommendation of a friend. I absolutely loves this wash!! It's very gentle and easy on skin, but also freshen you up and gives off a nice light scent with a hint of honey. Will be buying more when I run out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2020
Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Product, Five Stars!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to try this new brand and I was impressed that it is high quality product made in Italy. After using honeyfur I am very happy with this wash, it gave me a good clean wash without the chemical feel like most washes I have used. I like that it is a natural product and it has nice smell of tea tree oil but is very gentle on my sensitive skin. It doesn’t dry my skin and no irritation, so far I love it! Highly recommended, Five Stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best intimate wash ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time ordering this bottle and it’s truly the best one on the market! Very gentle, soft, organic, only natural ingredients, clear smell. Obsessed with this product actually.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware of ingredients
reviews.reviewText: The first time I used this product my skin burned so I looked up the ingredients one by one on the Environmental Working Group. A byproduct of the cocamidopropyl betaine are nitrosamines which have strong evidence for cancer. On California Prop 65 list of toxic ingredients they are classified as human carcinogens.So this productd went into the rubbish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Smells like Pine Sol
reviews.reviewText: Smells like Pine Sol -- very strong tea tree oil scent.
